text: Kendrapara Road railway station is a railway station on the East Coast Railway network in the state of Odisha, India. It serves Kendrapara Road. Its code is KNPR. It has two platforms. Passenger, MEMU, Express trains halt at Kendrapara Road railway station. ==Major Trains== * East Coast Express ==See also== * Cuttack district ==References== Category:Railway stations in Cuttack district Category:Khurda Road railway division
title: Kendrapara Road railway station
